author: dejanb
msg: activemq-run build should work with deploy profile - turning off source attachment

author: kkolinko
msg: Add clarification to RemoteIpValve and RemoteIpValve that to use their IP/hostname/port/protocol values in access log you should properly configure your AccessLogValve.

author: janstey
msg: CAMEL-4689 - Add back fail-fast behavior of camel-xslt. Keep new behavior of checking for XSLT via header.

author: gtrasuk
msg: Continuing work on classloading and codebase handling.  Now handling configuration files packaged inside the '.ssar' file.  Contained starter-service application (e.g. Reggie) now starts up successfully even though it's packed into a service archive.  Next step - complete the codebase server to map and serve download jar files (currently it starts up but doesn't serve files).  Also need to have the codebase server search for a free port.
